description: A React entry point that initializes and renders the root React component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React elements into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.Root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM node associated with the root.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component to help detect potential problems in an application.

methods.name: document.getElementById
methods.description: Retrieves an element by its ID from the DOM.
